Package com.jnbrauer.data

Class IntervalTree

java.lang.Object
com.jnbrauer.data.IntervalTree
public class IntervalTree
extends java.lang.Object
Immutable interval tree for storing time intervals and finding overlap between intervals.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    IntervalTree​(int min, int max, Interval[] intervals)
    Initialize an tree from a set of intervals.
    IntervalTree​(ReservedTime[] reservedTimes, int endTime)
    Initialize a tree from a set of reserved times.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Interval[] getIntervals()
    Get all the intervals contained in this tree in order by start time.
    int getOverlap​(Interval interval)
    Get the total overlap of an interval with the intervals in this tree.
    int getSize()
    Get the number of intervals in this tree.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • IntervalTree

      public IntervalTree​(ReservedTime[] reservedTimes, int endTime)
      Initialize a tree from a set of reserved times. Uses [0, endTime] for the range.
      Parameters:
      reservedTimes - reserved times
      endTime - maximum time value

    • IntervalTree

      public IntervalTree​(int min, int max, Interval[] intervals)
      Initialize an tree from a set of intervals.
      Parameters:
      min - minimum time value
      max - maximum time value
      intervals - intervals

  • Method Details

    • getOverlap

      public int getOverlap​(Interval interval)
      Get the total overlap of an interval with the intervals in this tree.
      Parameters:
      interval - interval
      Returns:
      total overlap with this tree

    • getIntervals

      public Interval[] getIntervals()
      Get all the intervals contained in this tree in order by start time.
      Returns:
      array of intervals in this tree

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Get the number of intervals in this tree.
      Returns:
      total number of intervals
